channel.title: Butte County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Butte County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: CA-70 South - Exit 46
item.description: CA-70 south at Exit 46 - CA-162/Oroville Dam Blvd.

item.title: CA-70 South - Exit 47
item.description: CA-70 south at Exit 47 - Montgomery St.

item.description: CA-70 south at Exit 48 - Nelson Ave./Grand Ave.

item.title: CA-70 South - Exit 49
item.description: CA-70 South at Exit 49 - Garden Drive.

item.title: CA-149 South at CA-70
item.description: CA-149 south at CA-70. Use CA-70 north for CA-191, Paradise, and Quincy. Use CA-70 south for Oroville and Marysville. This is the southern end of CA-149.

item.title: CA-149 South Approaching CA-70
item.description: CA-149 south approaching CA-70. Use CA-70 north for Paradise, Quincy, and CA-191.

item.title: CA-99 South at CA-149
item.description: CA-99 south at CA-149. Use CA-149 south for CA-70, Oroville, and Marysville. Continue south on CA-99 for Yuba City.

item.title: CA-99 South Approaching CA-149
item.description: CA-99 South approaching CA-149. Use CA-149 South for Oroville, Marysville, and CA-70. Continue south on CA-99 for Yuba City.

item.title: CA-99 South - Exit 376
item.description: CA-99 south approaching Exit 376 - Durham.

item.title: CA-99 South - Exit 383
item.description: CA-99 south at Exit 383 - Skyway/Park Ave.

item.title: CA-99 South - Exit 384
item.description: CA-99 south at Exit 384 - East 20th St.

item.title: CA-99 South - Exit 385
item.description: CA-99 south at Exit 385 - CA-32/Orland/Chester.

item.title: CA-99 South - Exit 386
item.description: CA-99 south at Exit 386 - E. First Ave.

item.title: CA-99 South - Exit 387A
item.description: CA-99 south at Exit 387A - Cohasset Road/Mangrove Ave.

item.title: CA-99 South - Exit 387B
item.description: CA-99 south at Exit 387B - East Ave.

item.title: CA-99 South - Exit 389
item.description: CA-99 south at Exit 389 - Eaton Road.

item.title: CA-162 West at CA-70 South
item.description: Overhead on CA-162 west. Turn left for CA-70 south to Marysville. Continue straight for CA-162 west to Willows.

item.title: CA-162 West at CA-70 North
item.description: CA-162 west at CA-70 north freeway entrance.

item.title: CA-162 West Approaching CA-70
item.description: CA-162 west approaching CA-70 North to Quincy onramp.

item.title: CA-162 West - Oroville Dam Blvd.
item.description: CA-162 west (Olive Highway) at Oroville Dam Blvd. CA-162 turns left here and continues on Oroville Dam Blvd.

item.title: CA-70 East - Butte County
item.description: CA-70 east shield in Butte County.

item.title: CA-70 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker to Quincy, Portola, and US-395 on CA-70 east, in Butte County.

item.title: CA-70 East at Pulga Road
item.description: Pulga Road junction on CA-70 east, Pulga.

item.title: CA-70 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker to Quincy and US-395 just north of Oroville.

item.title: CA-70 North at CA-149
item.description: CA-70 east at CA-149 junction in Butte County. CA-149 connects CA-70 with CA-99 for Oroville to Chico traffic.

item.title: CA-70 North at CA-191
item.description: CA-70 east at CA-191 junction to Paradise in Butte County.

item.title: CA-70 North Bus. CA-70 Exit
item.description: For Bus. CA-70 use Exit 46 on CA-70 east in Oroville.

item.title: CA-70 North Exit 46
item.description: CA-70 east at CA-162 junction, Exit 46, in Oroville.
